ThingDef.label: glowing troll
ThingDef.description:
A strange species of troll, that is found almost solely in the ashlands. The glowing troll appears to be a sub-species of the fungal troll, that has adapted specifically for life in polluted regions. Glowing trolls have a symbiotic relationship with certain species of fungus, which can often be found growing on the trolls back. This fungus appears to be somewhat toxic, and probably shouldn't be consumed... although...

Trolls are thought to have diverged from apes sometime in the past. Likely a very long time ago, as the only remaining ape-like characteristics are their appearance. Like most other trolls, the barren troll is not particularly intelligent, though more than makes up for this in brute strength.

Like all other trollkin, the blood of glowing trolls possesses strong regenerative abilities, allowing the troll to heal bleeding wounds relatively quickly. This blood may be harvested during butchering, and used to create elixirs of regeneration. If dealing with a particularly aggressive troll, it is best to set it on fire, as this will inhibit their regeneration.
